meanings.definition: relating to or affecting the skin
meanings.sent1: The dermal cream helped soothe her irritated skin.
meanings.sent2: Proper skincare involves using dermal products.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her cat's dermal care routine was more elaborate than hers.
meanings.sent4: The dermal sensitivity of some animals can be compared to that of humans.
meanings.sent5: The dermal layer acts as a protective barrier for the body.
